name: @reinforcezwei/favicon-fetcher

scripts.build:tests: tsc test-basic.ts example.ts --module ES2022 --target ES2020 --moduleResolution node --esModuleInterop
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node test-basic.js
scripts.example: npm run build && npm run build:tests && node example.js

author: ReinforceZwei
description: A Node.js library to fetch website favicons and titles with optional image metadata extraction
